metadata.Title: CVE-2018-7567 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - high
metadata.Description: ** DISPUTED ** In the Admin Package Manager in Open Ticket Request System(OTRS) 5.0.0 through 5.0.24 and 6.0.0 through 6.0.1, authenticated adminsare able to exploit a Blind Remote Code Execution vulnerability by loadinga crafted opm file with an embedded CodeInstall element to execute acommand on the server during package installation.  NOTE: the vendordisputes this issue stating "the behaviour is as designed and needed fordifferent packages to be installed", "there is a security warning if thepackage is not verified by OTRS Group", and "there is the possibility andresponsibility of an admin to check packages before installation which ispossible as they are not binary."

criterions.comment: otrs2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
